original_text: He came to the ram with the two horns, which I had seen standing on the bank of the canal, and he ran at him in his powerful wrath.
korean_text: 그것이 두 뿔 가진 숫양 곧 내가 본 바 강 가에 섰던 양에게로 나아가되 분노한 힘으로 그것에게로 달려가더니

sentences.original_text: He came to the ram with the two horns
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 두 뿔 가진 수양에게로 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: which I had seen standing on the bank of the canal
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 강가에 서 있는 것을 보았던

sentences.original_text: and he ran at him in his powerful wrath
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 맹렬한 분노로 그에게 달려들었습니다
